pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correlated Meta-Analysis // Performs Correlated Meta-Analysis ('corrmeta') across multiple OMIC scans, accounting for hidden non-independencies between elements of the scans due to overlapping samples, related samples, or other information. For more information about the method, refer to the paper Province MA. (2013) doi:10.1142/9789814447973_0023.
